rules.description: Post escape if right_control is pressed alone.
Tmux Prefix Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Tmux Prefix Mode [ ctrl+A as prefix ]
Left CTRL + 1 iTerm / + 2 Chrome / + 3 Slack / + 4 Spotify / + 5 Roam
